newsletter.title: Never Miss a Transfer!
newsletter.description: Get the latest transfer news, rumors, and done deals delivered straight to your inbox. Be the first to know when your favorite players make their moves across Europe's top leagues.
newsletter.successMessage: Check your email for confirmation and get ready for the latest transfer news.

footer.description: Your ultimate destination for the latest football transfer news, rumors, and analysis from leagues around the world.

about.title: About Us
about.heroTitle: Your Trusted Source for Football Transfer News
about.heroDescription: TransfersDaily delivers the latest football transfer news, rumors, and analysis from around the world. We're passionate about bringing you accurate, timely, and comprehensive coverage of the transfer market.
about.realTimeDescription: We monitor multiple sources 24/7 to bring you the latest transfer news as it happens, ensuring you never miss a major move.
about.communityDescription: Built for football fans by football fans. We understand what matters most to supporters and deliver content that resonates.
about.globalDescription: From the Premier League to Serie A, La Liga to the Bundesliga, we cover transfers across all major European leagues and beyond.
about.technologyDescription: Our platform uses cutting-edge technology to aggregate, analyze, and present transfer news in the most accessible way possible.
about.storyParagraph1: TransfersDaily was born from a simple frustration: the difficulty of finding reliable, up-to-date transfer news in one place. As passionate football fans, we found ourselves constantly switching between multiple sources, trying to piece together the latest transfer developments.
about.storyParagraph2: In 2025, we decided to solve this problem by creating a centralized platform that aggregates transfer news from trusted sources worldwide. Our goal was simple: make it easier for football fans to stay informed about the transfer market without the hassle of visiting multiple websites.
about.storyParagraph3: Today, TransfersDaily serves thousands of football fans daily, providing them with the latest transfer news, rumors, and analysis. We're proud to be part of the global football community and committed to continuously improving our service.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.heroDescription: Have a question, suggestion, or want to share transfer news? We'd love to hear from you. Get in touch with our team.
contact.subject: Subject
contact.messagePlaceholder: Tell us more about your inquiry...
contact.tipsDescription: Have breaking transfer news to share?
contact.responseDescription: We typically respond to all inquiries within 24 hours during business days.
contact.faqQuestion1: How often is your content updated?
contact.faqAnswer1: Our content is updated continuously throughout the day. We monitor multiple sources 24/7 to ensure you get the latest transfer news as it happens.
contact.faqAnswer2: Yes! If you have credible transfer news or tips, please send them to tips@transfersdaily.com. We verify all submissions before publishing.
contact.faqQuestion3: How do you verify transfer rumors?
contact.faqAnswer3: We cross-reference multiple reliable sources and clearly label content as confirmed transfers, rumors, or speculation to help readers understand credibility.
contact.faqAnswer4: Yes, our newsletter is completely free. You can subscribe to receive daily transfer updates and never miss important news.
